label: 朝河貫一
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: The pioneer historian of medieval Japanese history, [who] typified [the] positivistic approach.  As a member of the Yale University faculty from 1905 to 1946, he spent much of his scholarly life in search of a definition of feudalism that could be applied to both Europe and Japan (p. 2).
